# contentful Provider

Manage Contentful spaces and related configuration with Terraform.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "contentful" {
  access_token = "CFPAT-12345"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `access_token` (String, Sensitive)
- `url` (String)
